betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The power that lingers in this world, the force that gave power to Bane, the temporal Fractallite, is not fully his own.
There is another that lends this power, another that twists the hand of time.
If Bane is a catalyst to its power, the Elder One of Greckon is its source.
The Blind Goat that devours all. Time always passes. Chaos always grows. The Army of Darkness never stops growing.
By itself this process is slow. Not geologically slow. Not planetarily slow. Cosmically slow. 
Even for the universe itself, the growth of this army, by itself, would be a slow process, and yet Bane, thanks to its powers, was able to catalyze it, and to turn it into a dangerous growth, one that ever theratens to expand through all the universe, if given the chance.
This would be the end of time.
